author: Tim Marcin
title: Please brands, no April Fools' Day pranks this year
description: April Fools' Day is nearly here and, in more typical times, that'd mean a bevy of brands pulling their usual "fun" pranks. To those brands, I plead: Please, no. Not this year. Not as the coronavirus rampages throughout the globe, sickening and killing thousan…
content:
April Fools' Day is nearly here and, in more typical times, that'd mean a bevy of brands pulling their usual "fun" pranks. 
To those brands, I plead: Please, no. Not this year. 
Not as the coronavirus rampages throughout the globe, sickening and killing tho… [+2992 chars]
